title: CG Vyapam Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 50 Handpump Technician Posts
description: The Chhattisgarh Vyavasayil Pariksha Mandal (CG Vyapam) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 50 Handpump Technician Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 12th and ITI can apply for the CG Vyapam Recruitment 2025 . The interseted applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process,...
